mapper.sql: id, company, company_code, contact_name, contact_mobile, contact_email, account_type, account, status, balance, is_deleted, gmt_create, creator, gmt_modified, modifier
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from customer
order by ${orderByClause}
